LanguageData.MakeStoneBlocks.label: make stone blocks
LanguageData.MakeStoneBlocks.description: Cuts rock chunks into usable stone blocks.
LanguageData.ExtractMetalFromSlag.label: smelt metal from slag
LanguageData.ExtractMetalFromSlag.description: Use heat and strong electromagnets to separate useful metal from slag chunks.
LanguageData.MakeWoodPlanks_Hand.label: make wood planks
LanguageData.MakeWoodPlanks_Hand.description: Cuts 10 logs into 25 wood planks by hand. Quite slow.
LanguageData.MakeWoodPlanks_Electric.label: make wood planks
